en.title: Letter of Appreciation (Electrical Award)
en.description: Awarded for securing highest marks in Electrical subjects among all students of 09-batch from Nepal Engineering College.

en.title: Letter of Appreciation (Mechanical Award)
en.description: Awarded for securing highest marks in Mechanical subjects among all students of 09-batch from Nepal Engineering College.

en.title: Nepal Telecommunication Authority project award
en.description: Awarded for best project among undergraduate final year project of Computer Engineering of Department of Computer Engineering of Nepal Engineering College, Pokhara University in 2014.

en.title: Bachelor's Degree with inclusion in the DEAN'S LIST
en.description: Awarded in recognition of an outstanding meritorious achievement.
